item.description:
Black Francis (aka Frank Black of the Pixies) - solo acoustic

Saturday, October 22

Brighton Music Hall

Doors at 8 PM; 18+ show

Advance Box Office Price $20

 

Boston legend Black Francis is performing two solo acoustic shows (one here, one in Providence) before heading back out with the Pixies for more Doolittle tour dates. 

http://blackfrancis.net/

Let's plan to meet at the venue around 8:15 just after doors open and have a few drinks at the bar inside (the one on the left) before the show starts.  I'll send my number out before the show so you can find the group.

You can get tickets via the link above, or at the Paradise box office (sans absurd Ticketmaster fees).
item.how_to_find_us: Call/text Matt at 617-549-8453 to find me and the group.
item.name: Black Francis (aka Frank Black of Pixies)@ Brighton Music Hall
